content.html:
Orders placed online are available for local pick up at our production facility located just up the street from our retail store in Buffalo, NY. Please do not stop by until you have receive an email notification that your order is ready to be picked up. 

Local pick up hours:

  • Monday to Friday: 11 am to 4 pm
  • Saturday + Sunday: Closed

 
Pick up location (just up the street from our store):

Oxford Pennant Manufacturing Studio
769 Main St.
Buffalo, NY 14203 

Required COVID protocol for pick-ups:

  • Protective masks must be worn
  • Pick-ups will be made at the front door of our production facility
  • Please be respectful of others and practice social distancing when arriving for pick-ups
  • Our retail store will not be open for additional shopping -- we apologize for any inconvenience

For questions regarding pick-ups, please email orders@oxfordpennant.com
